page.title: 18 HOUSES.
page.content: In the countryside in our area there are very few houses. There are some cottages,some modern houses and a few Georgian houses. There are no villages in our area. There are about 3,000 to 4,000 houses in our area of Barnstaple. In the town approximately half are Victorian, one third are Modern and one tenth are Georgian. These figures do not include several new blocks of flats. Many of the houses are Terraced around our area.Some of these Terraced Houses were built in the Victorian days. Alot of houses are being demolished in Barnstaple to make way for a new bypass. Some houses are now being demolished near our Health Centre so they can build some new flats.
